segments.text: Wow , you ’ re up early today ! What ’ s for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I felt like baking , so I made some muffins .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Smells good ! I ’ ll make some coffee . Do you want me to make you some eggs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll take mine , sunny side up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Www , I don ’ t know how you can eat your eggs like that ! Ever since I was small , I ’ Ve had eggs and soldiers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , my dad had scrambled eggs every morning for twenty years . It drove my mom crazy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know what really drives me crazy ? When I ask for soft boiled eggs , and they overcook them , so they come out hard boiled ! How can you dip your toast into a hard boiled egg ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go , honey , fried eggs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I said sunny side up ! How many times do I have to tell you .
segments.speaker: S2
